    • About Sandie Hea, CRS


    I have over 25 years as a St. Louis Realtor, and can say with complete confidence that I am the best choice for your real estate needs. My team and I have sold millions of dollars in real estate and have successfully helped thousands of clients meet their real estate goals. As a first born child, “competence” is at the top of my list of values for myself, and it should be for you, too, when selecting a Realtor to assist you when buying or selling your home.
